topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5516ec936368727474bf0600#post_5516ec936368727474bf0600
My life is not perfect, But I can wander about at night skulking with shifty eyes an unkept beard and ragged clothes, and not be bothered by the police, for no other reason then i happen to be white, 

I don't need a perfect life to realize that there is injustice in this world, 

I'm not gay but i want them to be free to live and love as they wish, I am not a woman but i want them to be treated as equals to be told they are just as good, I'm white, but i can see something wrong with 50% of the people committing a crime accounting for 80% of the ones being put behind bars for it,

topics.body:
Uc9's right.

SJW's are pretty much privileged people who bitch on the internet about how underprivileged women and POC and butt into their affairs without actually knowing what It's like.

Privileged People should instead actually do things to make things better for them rather than bitch about the So called Oppression.

TL;DR: If you want to fight against misogyny, Do something about the real misogyny in the third world countries rather than equate staring at someone's breasts with rape.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5516ef5463687277d4090600#post_5516ef5463687277d4090600
Think about it this way: if you were a woman and you got raped and were in a shelter after a medical examination wouldn't you want to take a shower with soap to get the person's stench off you?  Giving clean clothes and soap to a woman that has been raped is a godsend.

You want to know how you can support glbt, minorities, veterans and women all in one go?  Donate to your local shelter.  It doesn't cost a lot of money dude; donating old clothes you don't wear or blankets is extremely cheap.


There will always be inequality in the world, *BUT* giving a fresh pair of clothes, soap, letting them have a bath to a person that has been raped instead of them being forced to walk around with the person's stench all over them is a godsend.  If say they were raped in their own bedroom on their bed I don't think they would want to use those blankets either.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5516f2ae6368727657990600#post_5516f2ae6368727657990600
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]where the hell do you get off acting like you have had a bad life when right this second some kids parents are negotiating the price for a night with them?[/bq]
Cause that's what happened to my sister and told by our step dad that if he didn't let him have his way with her that he would throw us all out on the street but threw us out on the street anyhow cause she didn't want to keep letting herself get raped.  My mom got raped so often she now has a phobia about showers.  What our step dad's plan was that since my mom was starting to get over the hill and age he was going to replace her with my sister by divorcing my mom then marrying my sister and force her to bear his child, but cause my sister refused to he put her into a "camp".

... Oh and by the way she was 12 at the time and my mom was forced sterilized.
